items.title: Node.js deployment
items.solution:
Deploy Node.js app:
- npm install: Install dependencies
- npm run build: Build project
- pm2 start app.js: Start with PM2

items.title: Nginx reverse proxy
items.solution:
Setup Nginx reverse proxy:
1. Edit /etc/nginx/sites-available/default
2. Add proxy_pass directive
3. nginx -t && systemctl reload nginx
